name: Cantiga Hermética
description:
Cantiga Hermética is about the anguish and doubts of a single mother in the Brazilian backlands.

She gives birth to a boy who, after growing up, decides to go out in search of the world beyond his reality, hoping to find his father and a possible brother.


Davi Fonseca (composition, arrangement, piano and voice)
Alexandre Andrés (c flute)
Alexandre Silva (clarinet)
Camila Rocha (acustic bass)
Natália Mitre (vibraphone)
Yuri Vellasco (drums)
Lucas Filipe Oliveira (lyrics)
